channel.title: Changing a spawn location in a 317 and making in non wildy?
channel.description: Ok im looking to make a server and the base im using seems to have only one spot where it doesnt have wilderness how do i change the spawn location and where the spawn location is which most likely will be a bank non wilderness?

item.title: Changing a spawn location in a 317 and making in non wildy?
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

Maybe change the spawning location? Stand in the exact spot where you spawn, and do ::mypos, I think that’s the command and it will give you coordinates. Search one of the coordinates in client.java, and look around if you see the other coordinates. for example x2352 y2523 I would search for 2352 and if i find a 2523 next to that code, i would change it to your desired location.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing a spawn location in a 317 and making in non wildy?

item.title: Changing a spawn location in a 317 and making in non wildy?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

As King Lingerz stated above, it’s easier and more efficient to create a method that checks whether or not a player is in the wild rather than the opposite.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing a spawn location in a 317 and making in non wildy?

item.title: Changing a spawn location in a 317 and making in non wildy?
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:5, topic:299524”]Jc, you forgot that is a delta method, the method for others are
public boolean nonwild[/quote]

Or just do what I did which is much easier, make an IsInWild method and delete everything else.

That way I easily put in working wilderness levels and stuff.

Though if your having safe zones nonwild() would probably be better.

Read full topic
